page.title: 165 YEAR OLD'S DAY IN CRADLEY.
page.content: When I get up in the morning, an alarm clock wakes me up.I have breakfast, then my uncle takes me to school. When I get to school,I take my lunch-box in.Then it's time for the register and then all the children say if they're there and then we do some work. When we've done it,we have our milk then go out to play.When the bell goes we come in.Then we do some more work until playtime.I like maths best. On hot days we have a picnic on the tables on the field.We play there.In the afternoon ,I go swimming.I like to walk around in the water with my arms on my floats.We go home,then I watch television.If there is nothing else I want to watch,I turn it off and play with my sister.On Monday, I always watch "The Incredible Hulk", then I have supper and brush my teeth and go to bed.
